amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the final rule entitled "Implementation of the Fair Housing Act's Discriminatory Effects Standard", published by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits use of funds to implement economic sanctions which weaken credit availability and job creation through use of disparate impact.
